goalSetting.title: Setha Umgomo Wakho Wokuqala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Yonke indlela idinga indawo yokufika. Uyini umgomo wakho wokuqala omkhulu wezimali?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetha okukodwa ukuze uqale. Ungakushintsha kamuva.

goalSet.title: Umgomo Usethiwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kuhle! Usethile umgomo wakho we-{{amount}} we-{{goalTitle}}. Ake siqale ukufunda nge-inthanethi ephindaphindwayo!

simulate.title: Lingisa
simulate.subtitle: Bona ukuthi imali yakho ingakhula/inciphise kanjani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Inkokhelo incane kakhulu ukukhokha imali noma isikhathi siphelile sinemali esele:
simulate.add200Desc: Khokha R200 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukunciphisa inthanethi nezinyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Khokha R500 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukuze ukhokhe ngokushesha.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Yandisa inkokhelo yakho ukuya ku-R100 elandelayo.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenza inkokhelo efana nenye ngenyanga ngonyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Imali yakho etshaliwe ingakhula ngaphezu kwemali oyifakile nge-inthanethi ephindaphindwayo!
simulate.timeInsight: Nge-{{years}} iminyaka, unika inthanethi ephindaphindwayo isikhathi esanele sokusebenza.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenzi omuhle! Ukungenisa R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni eya emgomweni wakho.
simulate.debtInsight: Ukwandisa inkokhelo yakho ngemali encane kunganciphisa izinyanga zokukhokha futhi kunciphise inthanethi.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Ukugcina imali: inthanethi yonyaka ivame ukukhula njengoba imali ikhula (ukuphindaphindwa kwe-inthanethi).
simulate.debtTableHint: Imali okufanele uyikhokhe: inthanethi yonyaka ivame ukuncipha njengoba imali ekhokhiwe incipha.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Lokhu kuwukulinganisa okulula ngenhloso yokufundisa. Imiphumela yangempela ingahluka kakhulu ngenxa yokushintsha kwemakethe, izindleko, nezinye izinto. Ukusebenza kwangaphambili akuthembisi ukusebenza kwesikhathi esizayo.
simulate.chartError: Ishadi alikwazanga ukubonisa. Lokhu kuvame ukwenzeka uma i-react-native-svg ingaxhunyiwe/ingafakwanga kusistimu. Ungasebenzisa isilinganiso ngaphandle kweshadi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Amathiphu okulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, bese uqeda & yakha kabusha. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, bese uyakha kabusha.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Le {{scenarioName}} imeko ilinganisa ukubuyiswa kwe-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka ophindaphindwayo ngenyanga. Ngokufakwa kwakho nge-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, inani lakho elilinganiselwe liyoba ngu-{{total}} lapho {{growth}} kukhona ukukhula kwe-inthanethi ephindaphindwayo.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Kusho ukuthi: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ijolise ku-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka esikhathini eside, ivuma ukuguquguquka kwe-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Imiphumela yangempela iyahluka; lokhu akuyona isiqiniseko. Yisebenzise ukuze uzwe ukuthi inani nesikhathi zishintsha kanjani imiphumela.

compounding.title: Umlingo Wokwanda Kwemali
compounding.description: Funda ukuthi imali yakho ingakhula kanjani ngesivinini esikhulu ngesikhathi ngenxa yamandla enzalo ephindaphindiwe.

concept.title: Umqondo
concept.content: Cabanga ukuthi unesihlahla semali. Inzalo ephindaphindiwe ifana nokutshala imbewu ewela esihlahleni sakho, ukuze zikhule zibe izihlahla zemali ezintsha.

coreIdea.title: Umqondo Oyinhloko
coreIdea.content: Uthola inzalo emalini yakho. Bese uthola *inzalo enzalweni yakho*. Lowo wumlingo.

interactive.title: Kubona Ekusebenzeni
interactive.content: Ake sikubone ekusebenzeni. Hudula umshini wokuhlehlisa ukuze ubone ukuthi utshalomali we-R10,000 lukhula kanjani ku-8% nzalo.

emergencyFund.title: Isikhwama Sezingozi Sichazulwe
emergencyFund.description: Kungani udinga isikhwama sezingozi nokuthi kumalini ongasinqabela ngaphambi kokutshala imali.

why.title: Kungani Uzikhathaze?
why.content: Impilo iyenzeka‚Äîukulahlekelwa umsebenzi, ukulungiswa kwezimoto, amabhili ezokwelapha. Isikhwama sezingozi sikuvimbela ukuthi ungene esikweletini (noma uthengise utshalomali ngesikhathi esingafanele).

howMuch.title: Kumalini?
howMuch.content: Umthetho ovamile: izinyanga ezi-3‚Äì6 zezindleko ezibalulekile. Qala ngenjongo encane (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), bese wakhile.

interactive.title: Injongo Yakho
interactive.content: Hudula ukubeka izinto ezibalulekile zenyanga yonke (isiqashi, ukudla, ukuhamba). Sizokubonisa injongo yezingozi zezinyanga ezi-3‚Äì6.

quiz.title: Ukuhlola Okusheshayo
quiz.question: Kuphi okumele kugcinwe khona isikhwama sezingozi?

firstPortfolio.title: Ukwakha Iphothifoliyo Yakho Yokuqala
firstPortfolio.description: Dala iphothifoliyo yotshalomali ehlukahlukene efana nezinhloso zakho nokubekezelela ubungozi.

goals.title: Qala Ngezinhloso
goals.content: Isikhathi + inhloso = ukwabiwa. Izinhloso zesikhathi esifushane ‚Üí izimpahla eziphephile. Izinhloso zesikhathi eside ‚Üí izimpahla zokukhula okuningi.

diversify.title: Ukuhlukanisa
diversify.content: Hlanganisa izinhlobo zezimpahla (amasheya, amabhondi, imali emshinini) nezindawo ukuze oyedwa ongaphumeleli angacwilisi umkhumbi wonke.

interactive.title: Zama Ukwabiwa
interactive.content: Nyakaza ama-slider wamasheya/amabhondi/imali emshinini. Bona ukuguquguquka okufanekisiwe kanye nembuyiselo yesikhathi eside iguquka ngesikhathi sangempela.

riskReturn.title: Ukuqonda Ubungozi Nengeniso
riskReturn.description: Thola ubudlelwano phakathi kobungozi namathuba engeniso ekutshaleni mali.

intro.title: Yini Ubungozi?
intro.content: Ubungozi ukuthi ukutshalwa kwakho kunganda kangakanani noma kuwe. Ubungozi obuphezulu bungasho inzuzo ephezulu ‚Äî kodwa futhi nokudla okukhulu.

tradeoff.title: Ukushintshana
tradeoff.content: Impahla eziphephile (njengezimali) zinenzuzo ephansi. Impahla ezinobungozi (njengezabelo) zingakhula kakhulu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kodwa zinyakaza kakhulu.

interactive.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho
interactive.content: Hambisa isilaidi phakathi "kokuphephile" "nokubungozini" ukubona ukuthi ukushintsha nenzuzo yesikhathi eside kungashintsha kanjani.

options.A: Inzuzo ephezulu ihlala isho ubungozi obuncane
options.B: Inzuzo ephezulu engahle ibe khona ivame ukuza nobungozi obuphezulu

taxEfficient.title: Ukutshalwa Kwemali Okusebenza Ngentela
taxEfficient.description: Funda ngama-akhawunti angenteli / anenzuzo yentela nokubeka okuhlakaniphile ukugcina okuningi kwezokungenisa kwakho.

wrappers.title: Sebenzisa Isigqubuzelo
wrappers.content: Ama-akhawunti anenzuzo yentela njenge-RA, avikela ukukhula/izabelo ezinteleni ezithile.

placement.title: Indawo Yempahla
placement.content: Beka impahla engasebenzi kahle ngentela (isb. izimali zebhondi, abakhokhi bezabelo eziphezulu) kuma-akhawunti avikelwe intela kuqala.

interactive.title: Ukubeka Okuhlakaniphile
interactive.content: Hudula izimali ku-"Zinentela" vs "Zinenzuzo Yentela" amabhakede. Bona ukuthi ilinganiso langemva kwentela liyathuthuka.

quiz.title: Ukuhlola Okusheshayo
quiz.question: Yiliphi ihambelo elivame ukusebenza KAKHULU ngentela?

options.A: Ukuphethe izimali zebhondi ku-akhawunti enenzuzo yentela
options.B: Ukuphethe izimali zebhondi ku-akhawunti ye-brokerage enintelwa

reward.notEligibleMessage: Qeda zonke izimpumelelo ukuze uthathe umklomelo wakho!

takeYourTime.title: Thatha Isikhathi Sakho
takeYourTime.description: Ungashesha ezifundweni. Thatha isikhathi sokuqonda umqondo ngamunye.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Ukuzijwayeza Kwenza Okuphelele
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Buyela ezifundweni futhi uzame izingxenye ezisebenzisanayo izikhathi eziningi.

learnDaily.title: Funda Nsuku Zonke
learnDaily.description: Chitha imizuzu nje engu-5-10 nsuku zonke ukwakha ulwazi lwakho lwezimali.
